image_1.description: Borodyanka is a Ukrainian commuter town near Kyiv that suffered from Russian airstrikes.
image_1.reason: The image depicts a scene of destruction in Borodyanka, a Ukrainian commuter town near Kyiv. The photograph shows a multi-story apartment building that has been severely damaged by what appears to be an airstrike. This aligns with the text information which mentions Borodyanka as one of the first places to be hit by Russian airstrikes.
